scripts.start: sh -c 'for d in /app/apps/orchestrator-api/dist /app/dist/apps/orchestrator-api /app/dist/src /app/dist; do if [ -d "$d" ]; then f=$(find "$d" -type f -name main.js | head -n 1); if [ -n "$f" ]; then exec node "$f"; fi; fi; done; echo "main.js not found for orchestrator-api"; find /app/apps/orchestrator-api/dist /app/dist -type f -name "*.js" 2>/dev/null | head -n 50; exit 1'
